editor.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Image Magick]
editor.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Image Magick viewer supports PDF and various images formats preview. Requires external library to be installed on the server.]

global_param.name: IMAGE_MAGICK_CONVERT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Convert Path]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Full path on the server to the 'convert' binary]

global_param.name: IM_THUMB_QUALITY
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Thumbs Options]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Imagick Options used for generating the thumbnails]

global_param.name: IM_VIEWER_QUALITY
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Images Options]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Imagick Options used for generation the high scale images]

global_param.name: IM_CUSTOM_OPTIONS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Shared Options]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[You can add any Image Magick options you want here, applied to both thumbs and big images]

global_param.name: ADDITIONAL_ENV_PATH
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Environment Path]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Additional path to put in the environment PATH variable before calling the command. Can be necessary for Ghostscript on Mac for example.]

global_param.name: ONTHEFLY_THRESHOLD
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Pregeneration Threshold]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Threshold (in MegaByte) under which the pages are all generated when opening the document, and over which pages are generated on-demand only]

global_param.name: UNOCONV
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Unoconv Path]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Full path on the server to the 'unoconv' binary (see docs)]

serverCallback.developerComment: Serve JPG previews for a PDF or imagick-compatible file.

input_param.name: all
input_param.description: Whether to pre-extract all pages or pass them one by one

output.description: Depending on the mode, will return either directly an image (thumbnail), or a json structure containing links to all pages.

serverCallback.developerComment: Server a prefetched thumbnail for a PDF or imagick compatible file. See imagick_data_proxy.

input_param.name: file
input_param.description: Name of the page thumbnail, as returned by imagick_data_proxy request

input_param.name: src_file
input_param.description: Path to the original file, if the given page was not yet generated
